original: 漢靈帝駕崩後，少帝劉辯即位，挾其母何太后之勢力，大將軍何進在朝廷內權勢漸大，與依附董太后的宦官勢力衝突逐增。
text: After the death of the Han Ling Emperor, the young emperor Liu Bian ascended the throne. Taking advantage of the power of his mother, the Queen Mother, the general He Jin became more powerful in the court, and conflicts with the eunuchs who depended on the Queen Mother Dong increased.
